item.content:encoded:
Our family has recently started watching a show called “The Kindness Diaries” ( available on Netflix and BYU TV ). If you are looking for something positive in your media diet, I highly recommend it.

In the show Leon Logothetis travels around the world relying on the kindness of strangers. He has basic transportation, but is asking for help when it comes to a place to sleep, food, and fuel.

Too often we get swallowed up in the difficult and negative things in the world. I don’t recommend ignoring those things, but it is good to take a break to remember there are many good and fun things going on too.
